error.msg: Class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__char_82_base' which is inherited by class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__char_82_bad' does not have a virtual destructor.
error.verbose: Class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__char_82_base' which is inherited by class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__char_82_bad' does not have a virtual destructor. If you destroy instances of the derived class by deleting a pointer that points to the base class, only the destructor of the base class is executed. Thus, dynamic memory that is managed by the derived class could leak. This can be avoided by adding a virtual destructor to the base class.

error.msg: Class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__char_82_base' which is inherited by class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__char_82_goodG2B' does not have a virtual destructor.

If you destroy instances of the derived class by deleting a pointer that points to the base class, only the destructor of the base class is executed. Thus, dynamic memory that is managed by the derived class could leak. This can be avoided by adding a virtual destructor to the base class.

error.msg: Class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__short_82_base' which is inherited by class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__short_82_bad' does not have a virtual destructor.
error.verbose: Class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__short_82_base' which is inherited by class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__short_82_bad' does not have a virtual destructor. If you destroy instances of the derived class by deleting a pointer that points to the base class, only the destructor of the base class is executed. Thus, dynamic memory that is managed by the derived class could leak. This can be avoided by adding a virtual destructor to the base class.

error.msg: Class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__short_82_base' which is inherited by class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__short_82_goodG2B' does not have a virtual destructor.
error.verbose: Class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__short_82_base' which is inherited by class 'CWE843_Type_Confusion__short_82_goodG2B' does not have a virtual destructor. If you destroy instances of the derived class by deleting a pointer that points to the base class, only the destructor of the base class is executed. Thus, dynamic memory that is managed by the derived class could leak. This can be avoided by adding a virtual destructor to the base class.

error.msg: Cppcheck cannot find all the include files (use --check-config for details)
error.verbose: Cppcheck cannot find all the include files. Cppcheck can check the code without the include files found. But the results will probably be more accurate if all the include files are found. Please check your project's include directories and add all of them as include directories for Cppcheck. To see what files Cppcheck cannot find use --check-config.
